Name: AncientCage
Notes: A stationary object that will disappear once its SW_B gets triggered. Plays the "Open" animation and destroys itself after that. Plays a short cutscene using a special camera. It also supports an optional Bloom model.

SW_APPEAR.Description: Appears when this switch is activated.

SW_DEAD.Description: Activated after the cage has disappeared.

SW_AWAKE.Description: Enables rendering and resumes updates when this switch is active.

Camera.Description: Used when the cage gets opened.

DemoCast.Description: Can take part in a cutscene.
